text: Utrine (, ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Ada municipality, in the North Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Hungarian ethnic majority (97.49%) and it has a population of 1,038 people (2002 census). ==External links== *Utrine ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Places in Bačka Category:Populated places in North Banat District Category:Ada, Serbia Category:Hungarian communities in Serbia
title: Utrine (Ada)
